content:
<rule id="embedded-framework-05300" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <or>
                    <file filename="javax.inject{*}.jar"/>
                    <file filename="{*}atinject{*}.jar"/>
                </or>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Embedded framework - Javax Inject">
                    <description>The application embeds a Javax Inject library.</description>
                </classification>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Javax Inject</technology-tag>
            </perform>
        </rule>
